option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: cd $PROJECT_DIR$/../../../ && docker-compose exec --user devilbox php /bin/sh -c "cd /shared/httpd/happymonster && clear && echo 'http://happymonster.dvl.to/admin' && zsh ; exec bash -l"

option.name: SCRIPT_PATH
option.value: docker-compose exec --user devilbox php /bin/zsh -c "cd /shared/httpd/filamentadmin && clear && echo 'http://filamentadmin.dvl.to/admin' && zsh ; exec bash -l"
